name: Jewel Legend:Mystery Adventure
description:
Dark Castle, greedy dragon, precious treasure, beautiful princess ~ welcome to Jewel Blast, crack the old mantra, waiting for you is dazzling strange treasure!

Hundreds of delicate levels, the most popular Match 3 puzzle gameplay, compete with friends from all over the world.

Mind blowing infinite combos that you can't stop and won't stop.
Interesting gem elimination battle is on, come and get the mysterious items to open the event.

Game features:
-Hundreds of Well-designed levels, light on the fun whenever and wherever.
-Popular match 3 puzzle game, train your brain, walk through the mysterious temple.
-Log in via Facebook account, fight your way with friends from all over the world.
-Save the data, continue your elimination voyage when switching your phone!


Come and download the Jewel Legend, start the fantastic journey of the Mystery Place!
